narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
This second prelicense inspection for a Class A license and exit briefing were conducted with the applicant.  
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
The $350 license fee will be submitted by the applicant to the following address:
USDA/APHIS/AC/WRO
2150 Centre Avenue
Building B     Mail Stop #3W11
Fort Collins, CO   80526
Additional Inspectors
Heezen Dee, Veterinary Medical Officer
